Uses of Class
jyzer.items.constantpool.ConstantPoolInfo

Packages that use ConstantPoolInfo
jyzer.items This package contains the main contents (at an abstract level) of a classfile, such as methods, fields, interfaces, and so on. 
jyzer.items.constantpool.types This package contains all of the recent known constant pool entries. 
jyzer.items.factories Contains factories that helps building up the classfile. 
 

Uses of ConstantPoolInfo in jyzer.items
 

Methods in jyzer.items that return ConstantPoolInfo
static ConstantPoolInfo ConstantPool.getElement(int index)
          Returns the element at the given index of the constant_pool.
 

Uses of ConstantPoolInfo in jyzer.items.constantpool.types
 

Subclasses of ConstantPoolInfo in jyzer.items.constantpool.types
 class AbstractReference
           The superclass of each CONSTANT_XXXReference.
 class ConstantClassInfo
           Contains the following information: u2 name_index
Must be a valid index into the constant_pool table.
 class ConstantDoubleInfo
           The class representing CONSTANT_Double_info structure.
 class ConstantDummyInfo
           Undefined tags MUST be ignored.
 class ConstantFieldrefInfo
           Contains the following information: u2 class_index
An index into the constant_pool that is a CONSTANT_Class_info that has the field or method as a member.
 class ConstantFloatInfo
           The CONSTANT_Integer_info and CONSTANT_Float_info structures represent 4-byte numeric (int and float) constants.
 class ConstantIntegerInfo
           The CONSTANT_Integer_info and CONSTANT_Float_info structures represent 4-byte numeric (int and float) constants.
 class ConstantInterfaceMethodrefInfo
           Contains the following information: u2 class_index
An index into the constant_pool that is a CONSTANT_Class_info that has the field or method as a member.
 class ConstantLongInfo
           The class representing CONSTANT_Double_info structure.
 class ConstantMethodrefInfo
           Contains the following information: u2 class_index
An index into the constant_pool that is a CONSTANT_Class_info that has the field or method as a member.
 class ConstantNameAndTypeInfo
           The CONSTANT_NameAndType_info structure is used to represent a field or method, without indicating which class or interface type it belongs to.
 class ConstantStringInfo
           The CONSTANT_String_info structure is used to represent constant objects of the type String.
 class ConstantUtf8Info
           The CONSTANT_Utf8_info structure is used to represent constant string values.

          A static method to create a constantpool entry from the given DataInput.
